claims.quote: my biggest concern as a Detroiter is the gentrification that's going on.

claims.claim: Areas undergoing gentrification offer cleaner and safer environments
claims.quote: It's little bitty kids that can play differently in a cleaner street and a different environment.

claims.claim: Youth in marginalized communities feel unheard
claims.quote: as a youth growing up in Detroit, I wasn't heard.

claims.claim: There is inadequate protection for women and girls in society
claims.quote: there was no protection for women and girls then, and it seemed to be no protection for women and girls now

claims.claim: Violence against women is an epidemic
claims.quote: It's an epidemic going on in society, and because most of the victims happen to be black and brown, it is not.

claims.claim: The response to George Floyd's death has been impactful
claims.quote: I am forever grateful that during Covid 19, that man's life was lost, and the response to the death. I will ever be grateful for all the people, like the Black Lives Matter, everything that grew out of that one death.
